org.springframework.cloud.aws.core.io.s3

Class PathMatchingSimpleStorageResourcePatternResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.cloud.aws.core.io.s3.PathMatchingSimpleStorageResourcePatternResolver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.core.io.ResourceLoader, org.springframework.core.io.support.ResourcePatternResolver

    public class PathMatchingSimpleStorageResourcePatternResolver
extends Object
implements org.springframework.core.io.support.ResourcePatternResolver
    A ResourcePatternResolver implementation which allows an ant-style path matching when loading S3 resources. Ant wildcards (*, ** and ?) are allowed in both, bucket name and object name.

    WARNING: Be aware that when you are using wildcards in the bucket name it can take a very long time to parse all files. Moreover this implementation does not return truncated results. This means that when handling huge buckets it could lead to serious performance problems. For more information look at the findProgressivelyWithPartialMatch method.

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Alain Sahli, Agim Emruli

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PathMatchingSimpleStorageResourcePatternResolver(com.amazonaws.services.s3.AmazonS3 amazonS3, org.springframework.core.io.ResourceLoader simpleStorageResourceLoader, org.springframework.core.io.support.ResourcePatternResolver resourcePatternResolverDelegate)
      Construct a new instance of the PathMatchingSimpleStorageResourcePatternResolver with a SimpleStorageResourceLoader to load AmazonS3 instances, and also a delegate ResourcePatternResolver to resolve resource on default path (like file and classpath)

    • Constructor Detail

      • PathMatchingSimpleStorageResourcePatternResolver

        public PathMatchingSimpleStorageResourcePatternResolver(com.amazonaws.services.s3.AmazonS3 amazonS3,
                                                        org.springframework.core.io.ResourceLoader simpleStorageResourceLoader,
                                                        org.springframework.core.io.support.ResourcePatternResolver resourcePatternResolverDelegate)
        Construct a new instance of the PathMatchingSimpleStorageResourcePatternResolver with a SimpleStorageResourceLoader to load AmazonS3 instances, and also a delegate ResourcePatternResolver to resolve resource on default path (like file and classpath)
        Parameters:
        amazonS3 - - used to retrieve the directory listings
        simpleStorageResourceLoader - - used to retrieve object from amazon s3
        resourcePatternResolverDelegate - - delegate resolver used to resolve common path (file, classpath, servlet etc.)

      • setPathMatcher

        public void setPathMatcher(org.springframework.util.PathMatcher pathMatcher)
        Set the PathMatcher implementation to use for this resource pattern resolver. Default is AntPathMatcher.
        Parameters:
        pathMatcher - The pathMatches implementation used, must not be null
        See Also:
